parser¶

Parser module

This is a basic parser for Daffy assembly code. The parer expects lines in the form: $name: optype([$opname.attr | <float value>], ...)

exception daffy.vm.parser.ParserSyntaxError[source]¶

A syntax error

exception daffy.vm.parser.ParserUndefinedState[source]¶

The parser reached an undefined state

daffy.vm.parser.parse_line(line)[source]¶

Parse a line of input
